subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1736, how did it go?
description_text:
I finally set up my sim rig and My Pedals were missing the Control Box to
PC cord
On Mon, Jun 30, 2025 at 8:22 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Doug, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
